scene_description: Hero character at edge of cliff overlooking vast fantasy landscape

structured_prompt.short_description: A 28-year-old male hero stands at the edge of a cliff, gazing out at the fantasy landscape with a determined look, lit by a soft diffused Rembrandt setup with a neutral 5600K color temperature, captured in a static shot with an eye-level camera angle and a medium depth of field.

objects.description: A 28-year-old male hero standing at the edge of a cliff, wearing a rugged earth-toned leather jacket with a faded blue shirt underneath, dark brown pants with numerous scratches and scuffs, and scuffed knee-high leather boots, his short, sandy-blond hair messy and wind-blown, a short beard framing his determined jawline, bright blue eyes scanning the horizon, athletic build, tall and lean with broad shoulders, standing with feet shoulder-width apart and hands clasped behind his back, oriented at a three-quarter turn to the camera, wearing a wide leather belt with a silver buckle, a worn leather backpack slung over his left shoulder, and holding a sturdy wooden walking staff in his right hand, with a silver pendant in the shape of a bird hanging from a leather cord around his neck
objects.pose: standing with feet shoulder-width apart and hands clasped behind his back

structured_prompt.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, deformed, disfigured, bad anatomy, extra limbs, mutation

simple_prompt: A 28-year-old male hero stands at the edge of a cliff, gazing out at the fantasy landscape with a determined look, lit by a soft diffused Rembrandt setup with a neutral 5600K color temperature, captured in a static shot with an eye-level camera angle and a medium depth of field.
